resources.string: Notifications for the WorkMule practice application.
This practice app is an example of Notifications, ViewModel - LiveData and the WorkManager.
Next or Back to navigate to other fragments

The Request button fires time consuming tasks that take seconds to complete. If you click again before the tasks are finished, the requests execute concurrently.

The ViewModel presents progress with Notifications.

\BUG:
If you NAVIGATE AWAY from the fragment, Notifications are not shown anymore.
The Request button fires time consuming tasks. Those are handled by WorkManager./n/nThose tasks must continue to present notifications regardles of NAVIGATING AWAY from the fragment.
